scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'Bump version to %s [skip ci]'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add dist/ && (git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m 'Update build files [skip ci]') && npm run version:patch && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --latest --title "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "Automated release"
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && git add dist/ && echo 'Files staged for commit:' && git diff --cached --name-only && echo 'Would commit build files and create release...'
